## Azure AI Search Application - Project Status

### Project Overview
This is a complete Node.js application with Express.js backend that provides a modern Azure AI Search experience. The application features semantic search capabilities, query rewriting, and AI-powered result ranking.

### Technical Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express.js
- **Frontend**: Modern HTML5, CSS3, vanilla JavaScript
- **Search Integration**: Azure AI Search with semantic capabilities
- **Features**: Semantic search, query rewriting, pagination, responsive design
- **Styling**: White background with navy theme, ultra-wide layout
